item.title: echoserver.go
item.description:
Download package main import ( "fmt" "io" "log" "net/http" "os" ) func main() { // curl -SsLD- -X POST -H 'Content-Type: text/plain' -d $'hello
' 'http://localhost:8080/hello?a=1&a=2' // curl -SsLD- -X POST -F b=3 'http://localhost:8080/hello?a=1&a=2' http.HandleFunc("/", func(w http.ResponseWriter, r *http.Request) { writer := io.MultiWriter(os.Stdout, w) fmt.Print("\033[2J\033[H") fmt.Fprintln(writer, "url:
````") fmt.Fprintf(writer, "	%+v
", r.URL) fmt.Fprintln(writer, "```

headers:
```") for k, v := range r.Header { fmt.Fprintln(writer, "	", k, v) } fmt.Fprintln(writer, "```

querystring:
````") for k, v := range r.
